oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of conventional and organic land use types on water protection criteria in Germany
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kolbe, Hartmut
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nutrient turnover
Soil
Crop husbandry
Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The mean values and ranges of several water protection criteria were calculated for arable land, grassland and forests in Germany on the basis of research work and the literature. By additional evaluation steps, relationships and efficiency coefficients were calculated for the different types of land use. Methods of balance calculations are proposed as preventive strategies for efficient water protection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kolbe, Hartmut (2009) Effects of conventional and organic land use types on water protection criteria in Germany. Saechsisches Landesamt fuer Umwelt, Landwirtschaft und Geologie, D-Dresden, Abteilung Pflanzliche Erzeugung.
